pages.text: This farm can harvest $(item)Bamboo$() and $(item)Sugar Cane$() fully automatically. $(br2)When $(item)Observers$() realize that something has grown in front of them, the $(item)Pistons$() below destroy the plant and $(item)Water$() transports the drops to a $(item)Hopper$().

pages.title: Bigger Auto Bamboo Farm
pages.text: Here, instead of $(item)Water$(), a $(item)Hopper Minecart$() is used to collect the items, it is more efficient and usually makes more sense on larger farms.
